name: contentbird CMS Integration
author: contentbird GmbH

sections.description: This plugin enables contentbird customers to transfer their created content directly to their wordpress blog. Whenever the wordpress post went online, the plugin will inform the contentbird customer instance and the needed content information like URL or published date will be updated automatically. From that time on contentbird will track the content performance.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or use the WordPress Admin Panel to install the plugin directly out of the plugin store
  2. Activate the plugin in ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your personal installation token on the settings page of the plugin which you will get from contentbird
sections.faq:
Do i need to have a contentbird paid account to use this plugin?

No. You can get a 14 days free trial of contentbird @ de.contentbird.io to test contentbird and the plugin. If you want to continue using contentbird, you need to extend the free trial.

Will you be actively working on this plugin and extend features ?

Yes! Our main goal is to work closely together with our users. We are very happy about feedback to make our product even better.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Allow fetching post title from a dedicated block inside contentbird editor

1.0

  • Initial version
